items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: The media could not be loaded. It is beautiful and stretchy. I would size down one. if you want a tighter fit. Read more
items.author: C

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars A bit see through
items.body: Such a pretty dress loved it still see through a bit but other than it was beautiful Read more
items.author: Elena cano

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Formal wedding
items.body: This dress was for a formal wedding. I am 5’3”, with heels the dress length was perfect. The dress was extremely comfortable, it hugs the waist and hip just right. Read more
items.author: Jamie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sheer but pretty
items.body: Really loved this dress the fit is so flattering only thing is the frilly decor makes it costume like. So returning other than that really pretty. Also extremely sheer. Read more
items.author: D

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect dress for formal or everyday occasions, seriously.
items.body: i didn't initially expect to like this as much as i ended up adoring it. the champagne flute silhouette is SO flattering. its super fitted down to the middle of the thigh on me which makes it attractive and enticing. i thought initially it would be too modest, but its actually very pretty and boosts my confidence to wear it too. the fabric feels amazing every step i take in it. the quality is very very good. its fabric is thick and double layered. no see throughs at all. Read more
items.author: Zara

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Add to cart
items.body: Absolutely in love with this long black dress. The straps are adjustable. The material is not see-through and this dress is stretchy. The fit is perfect and the quality and value for the money is top notch. I plan on wearing the stress for date night and upcoming vacation. I do love how the straps flutter in the back to get this dress more style. I highly recommend this dress. This is very comfortable and stylish. Read more
items.author: For the Love of things

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: Very elegant and perfect for my gal that is 5, 1. Only problem was getting out the wrinkles. Overall, priced right and very pretty. Read more
items.author: James Pernick

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great and perfect fit
items.body: Acquired this beauty for my beauty and it looks amazing on her. Has a great fit (not to tight where it shouldn't be as she says) and the material has a really nice feel to it. Paired with some low heels and it looks stunning. Has good movement and very comfortable. Price point is perfect and she is too. Read more
items.author: Jeff lynam

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Cocktail Bodycon Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Cocktail Bodycon Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blackfloral, Wine, Brown, Navy, Lavender, Pink, White, Blue, Yellow, Rose, Black, Bluefloral. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
